testCase.requirementText: If descriptive metadata are available, they SHOULD be included in sub-folder descriptive.
testCase.description: This requirement recommends that any descriptive metadata included in the IP should be placed in the "descriptive" sub-folder. The requirement is not specific, but we can assume it refers to the "descriptive" folder in the "metadata" path of the IP. The specification only recommends descriptive metadata schemas and does not provide a MUST requirement, so it's not reasonably feasibly to infer whether any given object in the IP may be descriptive metadata and thus whether it's path should throw a warning.
